resources.string: Why choose this DEC over another?
The best work internship in six semesters
what is unique about our program?
University prep to go into engineering
A great option to work in the IT field
What is unique to the program?

The Legacy to Mobile (L2M) program provides a unique experience in developing and supporting computer systems to satisfy business requirements. Graduates are well trained for a career as a programmer analyst or as technical support. Students will also benefit from excellent on-site training at companies, which may lead to full-time jobs.

The skills and tools ultilized consist of: Problem solving ,Software design ,Operating systems ,Computer programming ,Client/server - multi-tiered architecture ,Web development ,Object-oriented programming ,Mobile device programming ,Database design and management and Mainframe application programming

During the sixth semester, students will be placed into different companies for their externship. The externship is going to be 12 weeks long. This experience is going to allow the student to apply his knowledge in a real workspace. At the end of the externship, students may have the possibility to stay in the same company as a worker.

A career as a Computer Programmer Analyst can provide you with exciting and rewarding work in areas such as: computer programming, web development, systems development, data modeling, and database administration.
